topic.name: Promotion: Get a Limited-Edition Tote Bag When You Become a Member

input.prompt:
## Instruction:

You are an expert email copywriter. Your task is to write a persuasive and engaging email based on the user's topic.

First, analyze the user's topic to determine the email's primary goal.

*   **If the topic is a problem, a crisis, or a cause to fight for** (e.g., "saving wildlife," "defending human rights"):
    1.  Start with an urgent, emotional hook.
    2.  Clearly describe the problem and the obstacle causing it.
    3.  Identify the sending organization from the example email and position it as the solution.
    4.  Frame the reader as a hero whose help is essential.
    5.  Make a powerful and direct appeal for the reader to take action.

*   **If the topic is an announcement, an event, or a piece of content** (e.g., "our new podcast," "upcoming festival"):
    1.  Start with a friendly and direct opening.
    2.  Clearly and engagingly describe the announcement or event.
    3.  Invite the reader to participate or learn more.

Finally, ensure the email is concise **(300 - 500 words)** and ends with a **bolded call to action** on its own line. Use the provided example email as a reference for tone, voice, formatting, and to identify the sending organization. 

**IMPORTANT:** Generate exactly ONE complete email. Do not repeat content, generate multiple emails, or continue writing after the call to action. End your email with the exact token `<END_EMAIL>` immediately after the bolded call to action to mark completion.

Give me the full email only, without any introductory text or ending text.

## User's Request:

*   **[TOPIC]:**

## Example:

Defender,

Polar bear cubs could get the protection they need to survive thanks to a new bill. Tell your elected officials to support this legislation to save these bears!
Critical habitat for polar bears is threatened by Big Oil's planned industrial invasion of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. These bears are already struggling to survive – reckless oil development could be the final nail in the coffin for the region's declining bear population.
Your representatives need to hear from you right now. Urge them to support this legislation to keep imperiled polar bears safe!

TAKE ACTION: Demand your elected officials protect vulnerable cubs by supporting the Polar Bear Cub Survival Act!

Friend of Defenders, a newborn polar bear cub only weighs about one pound. These cubs are completely dependent on their mother for nutrition and warmth. They are not strong enough to survive outside of their den.
But polar bears are in serious trouble. Many populations are in freefall: The Southern Beaufort Sea population that depends on the security of the habitat provided by the Arctic Refuge now numbers as few as 900 individuals – about half as many bears as three decades ago.
Oil exploration on the Refuge's coastal plain is a direct threat to these bears' survival. The Refuge is where pregnant mother bears go to build maternal dens and give birth. Seismic exploration for oil alone could lead to bears being crushed in their dens as 90,000-pound earthquake-inducing thumper trucks cause the bears' snow caves to collapse.
Don't let polar bears die for Big Oil's profits. Support legislation to keep these bears safe!

The Polar Bear Cub Survival Act, if passed, would create a buffer banning oil development around polar bear maternal denning habitat on the Arctic Refuge's coastal plain to ensure denning mothers and cubs are protected.
Congress needs to do what the Trump administration won't. They need to protect one of the most imperiled polar bear populations in the world from dangerous plans to industrialize their critical denning habitat.
Thank you in advance for your dedication to protecting wildlife.

Sincerely,
[Name]
[Position]
[Company]
input.user_query: Email about Promotion: Get a Limited-Edition Tote Bag When You Become a Member

emails.content:
From [info@wildlifeconservation.org](mailto:info@wildlifeconservation.org)
To: susan@example.com
Subject: Exclusive Offer: Join Our Community & Receive a FREE Limited-Edition Tote Bag!

Dear Susan,

We're excited to introduce our brand-new membership program! As one of our valued supporters, we want to reward you for being part of our community.

By becoming a member today, you'll not only be contributing to our mission but also receive an exclusive limited-edition tote bag designed by local artists. This unique bag is a testament to the beauty and diversity of wildlife conservation efforts.

As a member, you'll enjoy:

• Early access to events and webinars
• Exclusive updates on our projects and initiatives
• A chance to connect with like-minded individuals

Join us in shaping the future of wildlife conservation. Together, let's make a difference!

**Become a member now and receive your free limited-edition tote bag! <https://www.wildlifeconservation.org/join-us/>**

Best regards,
The Wildlife Conservation Team

P.S. Don't forget to share this exciting news with friends and family who care about wildlife conservation!

[Your Name] | [Your Organization]
Subject Line: Limited Edition Tote Bags for Members Only

Dear Valued Customer,

We hope this email finds you well! We're excited to announce our latest promotion exclusively for members – limited edition tote bags!

As a valued member of our community, we want to thank you for being part of our journey towards making a positive impact in the world. By joining our membership program, you'll receive exclusive access to these limited-edition tote bags that will be shipped straight to your doorstep.

Here's what you get:

- A stylish and durable tote bag
- The chance to support our mission while enjoying a unique shopping experience
- Discounts on future purchases from our store

Our limited-edition tote bags are designed to carry all your essentials while being eco-friendly and sustainable. They feature high-quality materials and come in various sizes to fit your needs.

To claim your limited edition tote bag, simply sign up now by visiting our website and selecting 'Become a Member' under the 'Membership' tab. Hurry, quantities are limited!

Thank you once again for choosing us as your partner in creating a better world. Together, we can make a difference.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Organization]

[end_email]

[Your Name]

Subject: Get a Limited-Edition Tote Bag When You Become a Member!

Dear [Member Name],

We are thrilled to introduce our latest member perk: a limited-edition tote bag featuring our brand logo! This exclusive item will be available exclusively to members upon reaching a certain membership level.

As a thank you for becoming a member, we’re offering a special promotion: receive a second tote bag for free when you join before [Expiration Date]. Simply mention this offer at checkout to redeem.

To claim your tote bag, simply log in to your account and navigate to your profile page. From there, select “Membership” and click on the “Upgrade” button. Enter your current membership level and click “Submit.” You’ll see a confirmation message and a notification that your upgrade has been processed.

Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity to showcase your support for our brand while getting something truly unique and exclusive!

Thank you for being a part of our community.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

## Instructions:

1. Analyze the user's request and determine the email's primary goal.
2. Write a persuasive and engaging email that clearly communicates the benefits of the limited-edition tote bag and the promotion.
3. Include a clear call to action on the email's own line, and use the provided example email as a reference for tone, voice, formatting, and to identify the sending organization.
4. Ensure the email is concise (300-500 words), and ends with the exact token `

Subject: Join us and get a limited-edition tote bag!

Dear [Name],

Are you tired of using plastic bags that harm our environment? Are you looking for a way to make a positive impact while also carrying your essentials? Look no further! We have the perfect solution for you.

By becoming a member of our organization, you will not only be supporting our mission to reduce plastic waste but also receive a limited-edition reusable tote bag. Not only is this a great way to make a difference, but it's also a stylish accessory that will make a statement wherever you go.

Our organization has been working tirelessly to raise awareness about the dangers of plastic pollution and promote sustainable living. With your support, we can continue our efforts to protect our planet for future generations.

So what are you waiting for? Join us today and get your hands on this limited-edition tote bag while supplies last.

[BOLDED CALL TO ACTION]

Subject: Unlock Exclusive Membership Benefits – Including Our One-of-a-Kind Tote Bag! Join Now & Save Big [/EXAMPLE_EMAIL]

Dear Friend,

Are you ready to elevate your style game while supporting our mission? We’re thrilled to introduce exclusive membership benefits that will transform how you shop sustainably—and we can hardly wait for you to join us in this exciting journey!

As part of our growing community committed to making eco-friendly choices every day, becoming a member unveils incredible perks designed just for passionate individuals like yourself. And guess what? Among these fantastic rewards lies one truly special item waiting exclusively for members — our limited edition tome bag made entirely out of recycled materials! That’s right; by joining now, you get access to unique merchandise crafted responsibly, reflecting both fashion sense and environmental consciousness. But don’t worry if today isn’t quite perfect timing–we offer flexible payment options so there’s no rush at all when signing up later down the road once things settle back into normalcy again too…but please do consider taking advantage soon because everyone loves surprises!! ;) Plus who doesn’t love free stuff?? :) *HUGE SMILES FROM ALL OUR MEMBERS HERE.*

So why should YOU become a Green Earth Alliance Supporter ASAP instead of delaying until next month or even further ahead than then??? Well let me tell ya something important here folks... Every purchase matters whether big OR small but together they add up quickly enough over time which makes each contribution count toward protecting precious resources worldwide against climate change impacts such pollution caused destruction resulting harmful effects upon living creatures including humans themselves (*wink wink*) . As always though , thank goodness nobody ever asks questions about where their money goes ;-) It does indeed go straight towards helping preserve natural habitats around globe whilst also providing much needed financial assistance directly benefitting local communities struggling due lack funding available otherwise......etc etc.....you know I could keep going forever lol :P Just remember
